title: Klinik Pergigian Chu
address: 48A, Jalan Perajurit, Taman Ipoh Timur, 31400 Ipoh, Perak, Malaysia

reviews.name: Steven Kok
reviews.text:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Klinik Pergigian Chu for an impromptu dental treatment, and I must say it was an exceptional experience from start to finish.

The reception area was clean, simple, and welcoming. The administrative staff was efficient and courteous, making the check-in process smooth and easy.

My appointment began promptly.  Dr Chu conducted a comprehensive examination, addressing all the concerns I had with patience and clarity. His manner was impeccable, and he took the time to answer all of my questions, putting me at ease. He was thorough yet gentle, ensuring that I was comfortable throughout the process. Besides, he also provided me with valuable tips for maintaining oral health.

The ambience of the facility was superb, especially the soothe and calming music that was played throughout the treatment session.

Overall, my experience at Klinik Pergigian Chu surpassed my expectations. The staff went above and beyond to ensure my comfort and satisfaction, and I left feeling grateful for the exceptional care I received.

I highly recommend this clinic to anyone in search of quality dental care in Ipoh.

reviews.text: Pergi hari ini pergi untuk check gigi sebab akar gigi saya terdedah dan memang sakit kalau makan coklat ataupun minum air terlalu panas atau sejuk. Masuk je pegawai kaunter minta IC, tanya ada masalah kesihatan lain ke etc dan suruh saya tunggu tak perlu ambik nombor ataupun guna QMS sebab system dia takde ambik nombor utk periksa kesihatan. Sebelum check gigi, nurse ambil pressure check, lepas tu doctor ada check gigi, memang check tanya semua yang berkaitan dengan gigi, apa kita makan, nasihati dengan rawatan lanjut. Dah check semua, bayar RM 3 semua inclusive RM 1 bayaran biasa dan RM 2 sebab buat tampalan gigi dan dapat ubat gigi untuk percubaan. Kalau korang nak buat check gigi dengan cepat kat klinik kerajaan saya recommend but kat UTC memang kurang dari 1 jam dah buat semua.

reviews.text:
I had my first ever tooth extraction with absolutely no pain, all thanks to Dr. Bryan! I was really nervous at first, but the whole process was smooth, gentle, and surprisingly comfortable.

What impressed me even more was how Dr. Bryan helped solve my long-time tooth sensitivity issue without jumping straight to root canal treatment. I had been told elsewhere that I needed root canals for four teeth, which not only didn‚Äôt feel right for me, but would‚Äôve also cost a bomb üí∏. Dr. Bryan offered a more practical, conservative solution and it worked!

Grateful to finally be able to enjoy cold treats again without flinching. Highly recommend this clinic for anyone looking for professional, honest, and skillful dental care!

reviews.text: I had a great experience getting my teeth scaled at Dentist @ 18 by Dr Chin. The entire procedure was surprisingly comfortable, and my teeth felt incredibly clean afterward. I also appreciated how the dentist took the time to give me tips on maintaining good oral hygiene. Definitely will come again for every 6 months check up. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a professional and friendly dental cleaning!

The team is professional, friendly, and truly cares about their patients. Dr. Surinder and Dr. Sumeetha were both highly skilled and made every procedure comfortable and stress-free.

One of the standout features of this clinic is its accessibility for senior citizens‚Äîthey have stair lifts, making it easy for elderly patients to reach the clinic without hassle. This thoughtful facility sets them apart from many other clinics.

The clinic is well-maintained, the staff is welcoming, and appointments are well-organized with minimal waiting time. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for quality dental care in Ipoh!

reviews.name: Krithiga Athinathan
reviews.text:
I recently had a dental implant procedure done at Surinder & Sumeeta Dental Clinic, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the results. From the initial consultation to the final restoration, the entire process was smooth and professionally handled.

Dr. Sumeeta took the time to explain every step, making sure I was comfortable and well-informed. The procedure itself was virtually painless, and their advanced technology ensured precise placement. The post-procedure care was excellent, with the team checking in on my recovery.

Now, my implant feels just like a natural tooth - strong, secure, and perfectly blended with my smile. If you're considering dental implants, I highly recommend Surinder & Sumeeta Dental Clinic for their expertise, professionalism, and outstanding patient care. Thank you for restoring my confidence to smile again Dr. Sumeeta üòÅ.

reviews.text:
I recently experienced a tooth fracture near a pre-existing damaged area of the same tooth. Despite it being 6 pm, the clinic typically closing time, I managed to secure an appointment. Dr. Leong, displaying incredible kindness and professional ethics, extended her working hours to attend to me. I'm truly impressed by her dedication to putting patients first. Words can't express my gratitude for Dr. Leong's meticulous work in restoring both damaged areas to perfection. Although grateful, I also feel remorseful for causing the clinic staff to stay back until 6:45 pm. A heartfelt thank you to Dr. Leong for her exceptional care today. She's the best dentist in Ipoh, and my entire family receives dental care here. Highly recommend.

29 September 2024
Today I went for cleaning of my tea-stained teeth, this time treated by Dr. Shirley Ng Khai Chien. Prior to this, I had a unpleasant experience with another dentist, where my teeth became very sensitive for 3 months after a dental cleaning. This time, it was different. Dr Ng provided me with a chewable blue pill that highlighted the unclean areas on my teeth. The cleaning process was smooth and painless. The doctor was very professional, patient, careful, and gentle. I'm very happy and satisfied with the service.

Dr. Lim is by far the most gentle and caring dentist I‚Äôve ever seen. He took the time to explain every step of the process and made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire procedure. He acknowledged my past dental trauma and made me feel supported and understood, which was very comforting. I also love that the clinic follows up with you through text to check on your condition after your appointment. It shows how much they truly care about their patients.

This has been the best dental experience I‚Äôve ever had, and I highly recommend Happy Dental Clinic and Dr. Lim to anyone looking for a thoughtful, professional, and compassionate dentist!

The best dental clinic in town Ipoh. I‚Äôve been suffering from a toothache for almost a week. Pegi klinik lain, dia suruh scalling sebab gusi bengkak then nanti sakit tu hilang dalam 5-7 hari. So cabut terus. Sebelum cabut, dia apply numb cream then baru cucuk LA. Kita yang nervous ni pon takut tapi dengar dia explain baik baik terus okay. Then lepas cabut, beliau explained apa yang boleh buat and tak boleh buat post tooth extraction. So thank you so much doktor Patrick.
After few days ada macam sakit sikit sikit sebab food particle sangkut üòÇ terus pegi klinik untuk cuci sikit bahagian socket tu.
So far, best experience untuk klinik gigi.

I went to this clinic to fill one cavity, but after consulting with Dr. Chew, she showed me that there were actually three, and one of them almost needed root canal treatment. She clearly explained the price range for my treatment.

The whole process took around 30 minutes, including the consultation, and there were no delays since I made an appointment.

I ended up getting two teeth filled because the condition was quite bad, and Dr. Chew explained the materials she used thoroughly. The procedure went smoothly. She even asked if I was in pain or wanted to stop after one tooth if I felt uncomfortable.

The total cost for filling two teeth was RM240, which I find quite reasonable, considering the extent of the decay.

I‚Äôd rate this clinic a solid 10/10. The staff were friendly and professional. Good job, LS Dental Clinic!

reviews.name: Silvia Wong
reviews.text:
I recently had a whitening treatment done by Dr. Jessica, and happier with the results! She was professional, gentle, and made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire process. My teeth look noticeably brighter, and the experience was completely painless.

A big thank you to the amazing staff as well‚Äîespecially San San, who was incredibly helpful and efficient with the appointment scheduling and follow-ups. The whole team was warm, welcoming, and made the entire visit smooth from start to finish.

Highly recommend this dental clinic if you‚Äôre looking for quality dental care and excellent service!
